data.name: Humanica
data.detailed_description:
The ancient world


It’s 10000 before Christ. Together with your settlement, you will have to go through the difficult path of mankind development from the Paleolithic to the Iron Age.

Survival is the most important thing



The primitive world is full of dangers. Get food and resources. To survive the harsh winter - store enough food and warm clothes.

Develop your settlement


Witness the agrarian revolution! Learn how to grow wheat, develop technologies, construct new buildings and come up with new ways to produce food. Learn carpentry to turn primitive pelt huts into log houses.

Defend and attack



Get ready to defend your tribe! Build defensive structures to protect yourself from bloodthirsty barbarians who coveted your food barns. But if you wish, you can attack the neighboring tribe yourself, using the global map.

Lead the tribe to success


Trade with your neighbors, fight, issue decrees and make artful products. Invent iron tools to become the best!
data.about_the_game:
The ancient world


It’s 10000 before Christ. Together with your settlement, you will have to go through the difficult path of mankind development from the Paleolithic to the Iron Age.

The primitive world is full of dangers. Get food and resources. To survive the harsh winter - store enough food and warm clothes.

Get ready to defend your tribe! Build defensive structures to protect yourself from bloodthirsty barbarians who coveted your food barns. But if you wish, you can attack the neighboring tribe yourself, using the global map.

data.short_description: Humanica - is a settlement simulator of primitive people, based on the extensive technology tree. Develop your village, survive the harsh winter and hunger, defend yourself from the attacks of bloodthirsty nomads, trade with neighboring tribes!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
